title: Discipline Me. A Sorority Hazing Novella: Stepbrother Dom, Stepsister Lesbian, Lesbian and Bisexual games, Bare Bottom Spanking, Submissive Training, Domination and Submission, Discipline
description: Pulled from London by her parents for partying too hard, Maddy West plans to take over her new college. She plans to rule the campus and take over the prestigious sorority Zeta Gamma Rho, whose committee members Maddy has put through hell in high school. But instead of taking control, Maddy soon finds herself in a submissive position. She is humiliated not only by the sorority and the campus, but also her stepbrother and stepsister, both of which have suffered at her hands in the past. It’s time for payback, and no one plans to go easy on Maddy. The only question is whether there’s enough degradation and discipline in the world to turn Maddy from a bitch into an obedient submissive.
author: Brooke Vestri
